name: part_010
file: tmp_【#ノエル生誕はっぴーLIVE】今日は誕生日！！好きなことしてはっぴーになろおおお✨【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [E1HXg-kjOI8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel performs 'Tori no Uta' on stage.
MC section. Noel thanks the audience for the previous song and gets excited to perform the next one.
Noel is exhausted, but Oozora Subaru appears on stage to cheer her on and join the performance.
Noel and Subaru perform 'Taiyou Shoujo' together.
MC section. Subaru congratulates Noel, who is moved to tears while talking about her dream of performing this song.

subtitles.original: はい、鳥の詩でしたー！
subtitles.english: Yes, that was Tori no Uta!

subtitles.original: いや、すごい。なんか羽ばたいていく感じ。
subtitles.english: Wow, that was amazing. I felt like I was flying.

subtitles.original: 羽ばたく...大空に鳥に...羽ばたく...
subtitles.english: Flapping wings... like a bird in the sky... flying...

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっと待って。あ、なんか団長、あれが歌いたくなってきちゃったー！
subtitles.english: Oh, wait. I suddenly feel like singing *that* song!

subtitles.original: ドーン！歌いまーす！
subtitles.english: Boom! I'm going to sing!

subtitles.original: ギラギラの太陽がある
subtitles.english: There's a blazing sun

subtitles.original: ワクワクが待ちきれない
subtitles.english: I can't wait for the excitement

subtitles.original: あれもしたいこれもしたい
subtitles.english: I want to do this and that

subtitles.original: Let's Summertime!
subtitles.english: Let's Summertime!

subtitles.original:
太陽少女
作詞：Mitsu (TRYTONELABO)
作曲：TAKT (TRYTONELABO)
subtitles.english:
Taiyou Shoujo
Lyrics: Mitsu (TRYTONELABO)
Composition: TAKT (TRYTONELABO)

subtitles.original: 青い空と白い雲が
subtitles.english: The blue sky and white clouds

subtitles.original: 心のボルテージあげていく
subtitles.english: Pump up the voltage in my heart

subtitles.original: ラムネ色のTシャツはね
subtitles.english: This ramune-colored T-shirt

subtitles.original: 今年一番のレコメンド
subtitles.english: Is my top recommendation this year

subtitles.original: 走り出した海岸線
subtitles.english: The coastline I started running along

subtitles.original: どこまでだって行けそうだね
subtitles.english: Seems like I can go anywhere

subtitles.original: 数え切れない夏休みチャレンジ
subtitles.english: Countless summer vacation challenges

subtitles.original: 君も一緒に行こう！
subtitles.english: You come along too!

subtitles.original: あっという間に進んでく時計
subtitles.english: The clock ticks by in a flash

subtitles.original: 短すぎじゃない？ My Summertime
subtitles.english: Isn't it too short? My Summertime

subtitles.original: 全部最高のメモリアルにしたい追い風
subtitles.english: I want to make it all the best memorial with a tailwind

subtitles.original: みんな連れて行け！
subtitles.english: Take everyone along!

subtitles.original: 素晴らしい太陽がサンサン
subtitles.english: The wonderful sun is shining brightly

subtitles.original: せーのでJUMP！
subtitles.english: Ready, JUMP!

subtitles.original: はじける汗
subtitles.english: Sweat bursting forth

subtitles.original: 宝石みたいにキラキラ
subtitles.english: Sparkling like jewels

subtitles.original: 眩しく輝け！
subtitles.english: Shine brilliantly!

subtitles.original: ギラギラの太陽がある
subtitles.english: There's a blazing sun

subtitles.original: ドキドキがいっぱいです
subtitles.english: I'm full of excitement

subtitles.original: あれもやろうこれもやろう
subtitles.english: Let's do this and that

subtitles.original: Let's Summertime!
subtitles.english: Let's Summertime!

subtitles.original: 涼しい風寝転がって
subtitles.english: Lying down in the cool breeze

subtitles.original: のびのびってお昼寝もいいの
subtitles.english: Taking a relaxing nap is nice too

subtitles.original: 夢の中ならなんだってできちゃう
subtitles.english: I can do anything in my dreams

subtitles.original: キラキラ光るスーパースター
subtitles.english: A sparkling superstar

subtitles.original: 流れ星を見つけに行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go find a shooting star

subtitles.original: 夜更かしだってへっちゃらだよ
subtitles.english: I don't mind staying up late

subtitles.original: 願い事が溢れそうな時は
subtitles.english: When my wishes are about to overflow

subtitles.original: Milky WayにDiving!
subtitles.english: Diving into the Milky Way!

subtitles.original: ちょっとくらい下手だって平気
subtitles.english: It's okay if I'm a bit clumsy

subtitles.original: みんながくれるファイトがある
subtitles.english: I have the spirit everyone gives me

subtitles.original: どこまでだって駆け抜けて行けたらいいよね
subtitles.english: It would be great if I could run anywhere

subtitles.original: 準備はOK?
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: はぁ、疲れた。もうだめだ...
subtitles.english: Whew, I'm tired. I can't do any more...

subtitles.original: ちゅわーす！ノエル、応援に来たぞー！
subtitles.english: Chuwass! Noel, I've come to cheer you on!

subtitles.original: ス、スバル先輩！？でも、もうだめ...
subtitles.english: S-Subaru-senpai!? But I'm at my limit...

subtitles.original: ほら頑張って！始まるよ！行くよ！
subtitles.english: Come on, do your best! It's starting! Let's go!

subtitles.original: ひとつひとつが全部全部が
subtitles.english: Every single thing

subtitles.original: 届いてるから上を向いて
subtitles.english: Is reaching you, so look up

subtitles.original: 体中に息を吸い込んだら
subtitles.english: Take a deep breath

subtitles.original: 叫んでみよう
subtitles.english: Let's shout it out

subtitles.original: みんな大好き！
subtitles.english: I love you all!

subtitles.original: ノエル、おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Congratulations, Noel!

subtitles.original: 毎日が記念日になーれ
subtitles.english: May every day be an anniversary

subtitles.original: キミのココロ照らしちゃおう
subtitles.english: I'll light up your heart

subtitles.original: 新しい元気をまるっと
subtitles.english: Delivering a whole bunch

subtitles.original: お届けしちゃうよ
subtitles.english: Of new energy to you

subtitles.original: 空の彼方まで飛んで行こう
subtitles.english: Let's fly to the ends of the sky

subtitles.original: せーのでJUMP！
subtitles.english: Ready, JUMP!

subtitles.original: はじける汗
subtitles.english: Sweat bursting forth

subtitles.original: 宝石みたいにキラキラ
subtitles.english: Sparkling like jewels

subtitles.english: Shine brilliantly!

subtitles.original: ギラギラの太陽がある
subtitles.english: There's a blazing sun

subtitles.original: 欲張っていっちゃいます
subtitles.english: I'm going to be greedy

subtitles.original: あれもしようこれもしよう
subtitles.english: I'll do this and that

subtitles.original: Let's Summertime!
subtitles.english: Let's Summertime!

subtitles.original: わー！ノエルすごーい！おめでとー！
subtitles.english: Wow! Noel, you're amazing! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: どうしたのノエル？スバル先輩だよ！
subtitles.english: What's wrong, Noel? It's me, Subaru-senpai!

subtitles.original: えーん...スバル先輩の太陽少女歌えてよかった...
subtitles.english: Sob... I'm so glad I could sing your 'Taiyou Shoujo'...

subtitles.original: ノエルが主役だろー！
subtitles.english: But you're the star here!

subtitles.original: ノエル本当に本当におめでとう！ダンスすごかったよ！歌も！
subtitles.english: Noel, serious congratulations! Your dance and singing were great!

subtitles.original: 団長ずっと去年のスバル先輩のライブを見てからどうしても夢があって...
subtitles.english: Ever since I saw your live performance last year, I've had a dream...

subtitles.original: あの団長、スバル先輩の歌を踊って歌って頑張りたいなって...
subtitles.english: I wanted to do my best singing and dancing to your song...
